entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
